item.title: RuPaul to Star in Action-Comedy Set in ‘Drag Race’ Universe From Director Adam Shankman, Bleecker Street and World of Wonder
item.description: RuPaul will trade the runway for the big screen, starring in a new and, as yet, untitled action-comedy from “Hairspray” director Adam Shankman. Bleecker Street has teamed up with Emmy-winn
